headline: Vicor (VICR) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of power conversion and control solutions provider Vicor Corporation (NASDAQ:VICR) fell 1.8% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs. The decline was not unique to Vicor, as the wider technology sector faced significant downward pressure. This sector-wide slump appears to be driven by a combination of investor profit-taking, following a strong year-to-date performance for chip

headline: What Does Wall Street Think About QUALCOMM Incorporated (QCOM)?
summary: QUALCOMM Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) is one of the best affordable growth stocks to buy. On August 26, Arete analyst Brett Simpson upgraded QUALCOMM Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) to Buy from Neutral, setting a $200 price target. However, Piper Sandler analyst Harsh Kumar lowered the firm’s price target on QUALCOMM Incorporated (NASDAQ:QCOM) to $175 from $190 on July 31, […]

headline: Qualcomm’s Board of Directors Appoints Jeremy (Zico) Kolter to Board
summary: SAN DIEGO, September 02, 2025--Qualcomm Incorporated (NASDAQ: QCOM) today announced the appointment of Jeremy (Zico) Kolter to its Board of Directors, effective immediately. Dr. Kolter will serve on the Governance Committee.

headline: Robo.ai (AIIO) Strengthens Global Leadership with Appointment of Xuan Yan

headline: Qualcomm (QCOM): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Qualcomm currently trades at $160.46 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 4.5%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.5% gain during that period.
